org.eventchain.layout

Class Layout<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eventchain.layout.Layout<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Bean's class

    public class Layout<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Layout is a snapshot of a POJO for the purpose of versioning, serialization and deserialization. Class name, property names and property types are used to deterministically calculate POJO's hash (used for versioning).

    Property qualification

    Only certain properties will be included into the layout. Here's the definitive list of criteria:
    • Has a getter (fluent or JavaBean style)
    • Has a setter (fluent or JavaBean style)
    • Doesn't have a LayoutIgnore annotation attached to either a getter or a setter
    • Must be of a supported type (see TypeHandler.lookup(ResolvedType, AnnotatedType))
    Inherited properties from superclasses will also be included.
